message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $12,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you, and this is a fantastic deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to spend up to $8,000. Would you consider lowering the price to meet my budget?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This offer stands as a testament to my eagerness to work with you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am still unable to meet the price of $10,500. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $9,500 if possible.
